title: Basilica of the Obsidian General
story: For a long time the basilica of the Obsidian General remained deserted. These days it is badly infested by mammoths, which don't care about the past of the place.

notes.text: A great double door with a keyhole to the west.
A crate containing an eldritch gem.
A burning fire in a brazier, bursts into flames when touched.
A dying dwarf, a bottle of wine and a sword of lightning among his belongings.
A key hovering in the middle of the room.
